item.description: Goldman Sachs is building AI agents with Anthropic’s Claude to automate trade accounting and client onboarding, aiming to speed work and boost efficie...

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Is the AI bubble popping itself? Software's break from the tech stock boom raises concerns
item.description: Many investors expect the sell-off has gone too far, saying agentic AI is unable to meaningfully hurt incumbents in the sector.

item.title: Kalshi expands surveillance, enforcement efforts ahead of Super Bowl 60
item.description: Kalshi on Thursday announced efforts to expand its surveillance and enforcement frameworks, just days before the Super Bowl.

item.title: Bitcoin bleeds for second straight day, nearly grazes $72,000
item.description: Bitcoin sank as low as $72,096.20 on Wednesday, marking its second consecutive day breaking below the $73,000 level.
